column5: stopped in at the Columbia outlet store in Windsor on the weekend and they have all their PFG clothing on clearance,an addtional 30% off the already sale prices. Lots of short and long sleeve shirts,pants . They also have a great deal on columbia vest reduced to 20 bucks from reg 99. I picked up the Columbia wading jacket reg 169 for 62 bucks. So if you are in the area and need some wear check it out.
